welcome_message_body: Welcome to Aston, USA! Get ready to experience the charm of our city, known for its scenic beauty, historical sites, and friendly locals. We hope you have a wonderful time exploring and enjoying all that Aston has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves domestic flights for major airlines such as American Airlines and Delta.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights for airlines such as United and Lufthansa.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic flights for airlines such as JetBlue and Southwest.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: This terminal serves international flights for airlines such as British Airways and Qatar Airways.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Greater Wilmington Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the terminal.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Wings Field Airport handles all commercial flights and has all necessary amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Wings Field Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing exclusive services for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport houses check-in counters, baggage claim, and security checkpoints.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is the primary departure point for domestic flights at Chestercounty Carlson Airport.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B serves as the departure point for international flights at Chestercounty Carlson Airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport, mainly used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
